lightArmor.name: Light Armor
lightArmor.description: Light armor provides 1 point of damage reduction and has no stealth penalty.

mediumArmor.name: Medium Armor
mediumArmor.description: Medium armor provides 3 point of damage reduction and has a -1 stealth penalty.

heavyArmor.name: Heavy Armor
heavyArmor.description: Heavy armor provides 5 point of damage reduction and has a -3 stealth penalty.

smallShield.name: Small Shields
smallShield.description: Small shields can be used to block. They have a shield bonus equal to your agility + 1 and no speed penalty while equipped.

mediumShield.name: Medium Shields
mediumShield.description: Medium shields can be used to block. They have a +3 shield bonus and no speed penalty while equipped.

largeShield.name: Large Shields
largeShield.description: Large shields can be used to block. They have a +5 shield bonus and a -5 speed penalty while equipped.

improvisedWeapon.name: Improvised Weapons
improvisedWeapon.description: Improvised weapons, including bottles, chairs, and weapons that you are not proficient with, attack with a Brawn roll and deal d4+Brawn damage on a hit. Thrown improvised weapons attack with an Athletics roll and deal d4+Athletics damage on a hit.

unarmedMeleeWeapon.name: Unarmed Fighting
unarmedMeleeWeapon.description: Unarmed melee weapons, including fists, feet, and tails, can attack with a Brawn roll or an Athletics roll and deal d6 + Athletics or Brawn damage on a hit. These weapons can also be used for two-weapon fighting.

lightMeleeWeapon.name: Light Melee Weapons
lightMeleeWeapon.description: Light melee weapons, including daggers, light axes, and brass knuckles, attack with an Athletics roll and deal d6 + Athletics damage on a hit. These weapons can also be used for two-weapon fighting.

finesseMeleeWeapon.name: Finesse Melee Weapons
finesseMeleeWeapon.description: Finesse melee weapons, including rapiers and curveblades, attack with an Athletics roll. One-handed finesse weapons deal d8+Athletics damage on a hit, and two-handed finesse weapons deal d12+Athletics damage on a hit.

oneHandedMeleeWeapon.name: One-handed Melee Weapons
oneHandedMeleeWeapon.description: One-handed melee weapons, including longswords, maces, and battleaxes, attack with a Brawn roll and deal d8 + Brawn damage on a hit.

twoHandedMeleeWeapon.name: Two-handed Melee Weapons
twoHandedMeleeWeapon.description: Two-handed melee weapons, including greatswords, mauls, and spears, attack with a Brawn roll and deal d12 + Brawn damage on a hit.

lightThrownWeapon.name: Light Thrown Weapons
lightThrownWeapon.description: Light thrown weapons, including daggers and throwing axes, attack with an Athletics roll and deal d6 + Athletics damage on a hit. They can attack targets up to 20ft away or up to 40ft away with disadvantage.  These weapons can also be used for two-weapon fighting.

heavyThrownWeapon.name: Heavy Thrown Weapons
heavyThrownWeapon.description: Heavy thrown weapons, including javelins, attack with an Athletics roll and deal d8 + Athletics damage on a hit. They can attack targets up to 40ft away or up to 80ft away with disadvantage.

oneHandedRangedWeapon.name: One-handed Ranged Weapons
oneHandedRangedWeapon.description: One-handed ranged weapons, including slings and blowguns, attack with a Perception roll and deal d4 + Perception damage on a hit. They can attack targets up to 40ft away or up to 80ft away with disadvantage.

twoHandedRangedWeapon.name: Two-handed Ranged Weapons
twoHandedRangedWeapon.description: Two-handed ranged weapons, including shortbows, attack with a Perception roll and deal d6 + Perception damage on a hit. They can attack targets up to 60ft away or up to 120ft away with disadvantage.

heavyRangedWeapon.name: Heavy Ranged Weapons
heavyRangedWeapon.description: Heavy ranged weapons, including longbows, attack with a Perception roll and deal d8 + Perception damage on a hit. They can attack targets up to 100ft away or up to 200ft away with disadvantage.

lightLoadingWeapon.name: Light Loading Weapons
lightLoadingWeapon.description: Light loading weapons, including hand crossbows and pistols, attack with a Perception roll and deal d8 + Perception damage on a hit. They can attack targets up to 40ft away or up to 80ft away with disadvantage. These weapons can also be used for two-weapon fighting.

twoHandedLoadingWeapon.name: Two-handed Loading Weapons
twoHandedLoadingWeapon.description: Two-handed loading weapons, including light crossbows and rifles, attack with a Perception roll and deal d8 + Perception damage on a hit. They can attack targets up to 60ft away or up to 120ft away with disadvantage.

heavyLoadingWeapon.name: Heavy Loading Weapons
heavyLoadingWeapon.description: Heavy Loading weapons, including heavy crossbows and sniper rifles, attack with a Perception roll and deal d12 + Perception damage on a hit. They can attack targets up to 100ft away or up to 200ft away with disadvantage.

craftedWeapon.name: Crafted Weapons
craftedWeapon.description: Crafted weapons attack with a Handiworks. One-handed crafted weapons deal d8 + Handiworks damage on a hit, and two-handed crafted weapons deal d12 + Handiworks damage on a hit. They can attack targets up to 40ft away or up to 120ft away with disadvantage.

arcaneMagicWeapon.name: Arcane Focuses
arcaneMagicWeapon.description: Arcane weapons attack with a Knowledge. One-handed arcane weapons deal d6 + Knowledge damage on a hit, and two-handed arcane weapons deal d10 + Knowledge damage on a hit. They can attack targets up to 40ft away.

divineMagicWeapon.name: Divine Focuses
divineMagicWeapon.description: Divine weapons attack with a Wisdom. One-handed divine weapons deal d4 + Wisdom damage on a hit, and two-handed divine weapons deal d8 + Wisdom damage on a hit. This damage is mental and ignores armor. These weapons can attack targets up to 40ft away.

unityMagicWeapon.name: Unity Focuses
unityMagicWeapon.description: Unity weapons attack with a Synergy. One-handed unity weapons deal d4 + Synergy damage on a hit, and two-handed unity weapons deal d8 + Synergy damage on a hit. This damage is mental and ignores armor. These weapons can attack targets up to 40ft away.

arcanistTool.name: Arcanist's Tools
arcanistTool.description: Arcanist's Tools allow you to enchant objects, create magic weapons, and create static magical effects such as traps and wards.

artisanTool.name: Artisan's Tools
artisanTool.description: Artisan's Tools allow you to work with paint, wood, stone, glasss, jewelry, and other materials to create objects or artwork with them.

chemistTool.name: Chemist's Tools
chemistTool.description: Chemist's tools allow you to create all sorts of potions and poisons.

explorerTool.name: Explorer's Tools
explorerTool.description: Explorer's tools allow you to plot maps, set snares, create and deploy traps, and climb sheer surfaces.

smithTool.name: Smith's Tools
smithTool.description: Smith's tools allow you to forge and repair weapons and armor.

spyTool.name: Spy's Tools
spyTool.description: Spy's Tools allow you to create disguises, fake documents, and forge signatures and seals.

thiefTool.name: Thief's Tools
thiefTool.description: Thief's Tools allow you to pick locks on doors and chests, as well as disable traps.

ridingVehicle.name: Mounts
ridingVehicle.description: A proficiency in Mounts allows you to gain the speed of a mount while in combat.

seaVehicle.name: Sea Vehicles
seaVehicle.description: A proficiency in sea vehicles allows you to perform any task needed in the maintenance and navigation aboard a naval vessel.

airVehicle.name: Air Vehicles
airVehicle.description: A proficiency in air vehicles allows you to pilot and control vehicles that fly through the sky, such as airships, balloons, and airplanes.
